name: Ferrothorn
description: The Thorn Pod Pokémon. They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

abilities.name: Iron Barbs
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, it may roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of steel damage equal to its proficiency modifier to its attacker.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters the battle, an opponent must reveal if it has a move that the Pokémon is vulnerable to. The move does not have to be revealed -only that there is such a move.
